title: Orchestrator: Diagnose (evidence -> fix -> validate -> WAIT_USER)
description: Orchestrator flow: collect evidence, plan minimal fix, apply, validate, loop; if insufficient evidence, WAIT_USER.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Start[Start] --> Ev[task.diagnose.collect_evidence.v1]
  Ev --> Cl[task.diagnose.classify_stage.v1]
  Cl --> Plan[task.diagnose.propose_minimal_fix.v1]
  Plan --> Apply[task.diagnose.apply_fix_and_validate.v1]
  Apply --> Check{green?}
  Check -->|yes| Done[Done]
  Check -->|no and iter left| Ev
  Check -->|no and insufficient evidence| Ask[task.diagnose.ask_user_for_missing_info.v1]
  Ask --> WAIT[WAIT_USER]
